p: Antimicrobial activity of the aerial part EO (Collective sample Bouilef-Hamla) were evaluated against two Gram-positive bacteria ( Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 and Bacillus cereus ATCC 25921) and two Gram-negative bacteria ( Escherichia coli ATCC 8739, Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603), two yeasts ( Candida albicans ATCC 26790 and C. albicans ATCC 10231) and three filamentous fungi ( Fusarium oxysporum MNHN 963917, Aspergillus fumigatus MNHN 566 and Aspergillus flavus MNHN 994294).
